description: Make CLI a great user experience
context:
Improve CLI UX while maintaining terminal compatibility. Consider:
- Better output formatting and alignment
- Color support (with fallback for no-color terminals)
- Clearer error messages with suggestions
- Progress indicators for operations
- Interactive confirmations for destructive actions
- Tab completion
- Consistent output for scripting (--json flag?)

Must work in all terminals - no fancy Unicode that might not render.
result: Added colors (NO_COLOR support), --json output, command suggestions, delete confirmation, improved error messages, column alignment
